s-scrollbar

Type:AtRule
Status:stable
Since:0.0.1
Platform:css
@blackbyte.sugarcss.css.rule

This rule allows you to style the scrollbar of an element or to hide it completely.

Params

  1. sizeOrHide*-String

    The size of the scrollbar or hide to hide it

  2. thumbColor*-String

    The thumb color

  3. trackColor*-String

    The track color

Return

  1. -Css

    The generated css

Example

.my-element {
     @s-scrollbar(10px, s-color(accent), s-color(accent, --darken 20));
     @s-scrollbar(hide);
}

Author

  • Olivier Bosselolivier.bossel@gmail.comhttps://hello@blackbyte.space
